marketinginformation: the Day/night Pan/tilt Internet Camera Server With Audio Provides Day And Night Security Over a Large Area. See, Hear And Talk to People in Your Camera's Viewing Field Day or Night From Any Internet Connection. Secure a Larger Area With Pan And Tilt Internet Cameras. Pan The Camera Side-to-side a Remarkable 330° And Tilt Up-and-down 105°. The Tv-ip422 Provides High Quality Video Streams Over a Secure Remote Connection. Advanced Intuitive Software Includes Motion Detection Recording, Email Alerts And Scheduled Recordings. This Camera's Brilliant Image Quality, Pan/tilt Functionality, Day/night Recording Capabilities And Built-in 2-way Audio Make it Ideal For Home, Small Office And Business Use.
